summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5609 for the improvement of 34th Avenue West, from West Barrett Street to a connection with the existing sewer approximately 182 feet north of West Ray Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 73860, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
